title: A Pop Quiz in the Tavern
setting_narration: The warm, inviting glow of Angel's Share offers a brief respite from the evening chill. The clinking of mugs and hushed conversations fill the air, but in a quiet corner, Amber and the Traveler are deeply engrossed in something more academic than alcoholic.

segments.text: Amber taps a small, rolled-up parchment against her chin, a playful gleam in her eyes as she looks at the Traveler.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Alright, Traveler! Next question for your Mondstadt Lore crash course: What's the biggest threat to the city, besides stormy weather and hilichurl camps?

segments.speaker: Traveler
segments.line: Hmm, the biggest threat... Is it... economic instability caused by a lack of proper trade routes?

segments.text: Amber blinks, then lets out a small laugh, shaking her head. The Traveler's guess was thoughtful, but not quite what she was looking for.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Good try, very astute! But I was thinking more... literally. The *literal* biggest threat, always lurking above us, ready to cause chaos if not handled properly!

segments.text: Amber claps her hands together softly, a triumphant smile spreading across her face.

segments.speaker: Amber
segments.line: Bingo! You got it! See, you're practically a Knight of Favonius already! Just a few more questions and you'll be ready for any pop quiz Master Jean throws at us!

segments.speaker: Traveler
segments.line: Thanks to you, Amber. Your lessons are much more fun than reading dusty old books.

segments.text: Amber winks, already flipping the parchment to reveal the next question, eager to continue the impromptu study session late into the Mondstadt night.
